text: 7. Show the use of prefix and postfix public class Increment { public static void main( String[] args ) { int Â¢ = 5; // assign 5 to c System.out.println( c ); System.out.println( c++ ); System.out.println( c ); System.out.println(); // skip a line c = 5; // demonstrate prefix increment operator System.out.println( c ); System.out.println( ++c ); System.out.println( c ); } // end main } // end class Increment
